title: Love Island's Olivia Attwood engaged to footballer Bradley Dack

Olivia Attwood is engaged!

The Love Island star has said yes to footballer Bradley Dack after he popped the question.

Sharing two loved up snaps to show off her ring on Instagram , she said: "He must be crazy... Here’s to forever . I love you BD"

The couple's fans and famous friends rushed to congratulate them.

Demi Sims commented: "He’s defo crazy but DEAD CUTE AT THE SAME TIME .. so happy for you both congrats"

"Congrats you two," Vicky Pattison said.

While Geordie Shore's Sophia Kasaei wrote: "Oh my god yessssss yesssss and yessssss"

One snap sees Blackburn Rovers star Bradley sweetly holding onto Olivia's hand - complete with shiny new jewellery - as they share a passionate kiss.

In the other pic, Olivia lays a hand on Bradley's chest as they look into the lens with huge grins on their faces.

Olivia, 28, and Bradley, 25, have been together on and off for four years, and she had been seeing him before her stint on Love Island, where she met now-ex Chris Hughes.

Just a few months ago, the TOWIE star dropped some surprising home truths about her relationship, including that she didn't completely trust her beau.

(Image: Instagram)

(Image: Instagram)

But the blonde bombshell confessed she was happy with some of Bradley's attributes — namely his "massive c**k" and "amazing bum".

Olivia told new! magazine: "We row about little things, like house-related things. I'm very OCD and he's very messy.

"I've also got a long way to go with trust. That's my own issue more than his. I don't think you should trust any man 100 per cent."

The couple met in 2015 but split in 2017 when Olivia went into the Love Island villa.

(Image: Instagram)

She was with fellow Islander Chris for six months before splitting and reuniting with Bradley.

Olivia now thinks the footballer is "the one".

She continued: "He's got a very kind soul... and he's f**king hot!

"He's got a massive c**k as well! And an amazing bum."

The couple had previously hinted that they'd get engaged this year.
